sickend.effect: -0 to STR, DEX and CON saves

stupified.effect: -0 to INT, WIS and CHA saves

enfeebled.effect: 0 rounds disadvantage to STR, DEX and CON saves

dizzy.effect: 0 rounds disadvantage on INT, WIS and CHA saves

impaired.effect: lose 0 actions, attacks or max spell levels each turn

rot.effect: deals 0 damage at the begining of each turn

mental_block.effect: deals 0 damage for each hostile action taken

bleeding.effect: deals 0d6 damage at the begining of every turn and for every 10ft moved

penance.effect: deals 25d4 damage at the begining of each turn
